item.title: Girlfriend
item.description: Anushka Poddar is my current girlfriend who(m?) I love.

item.title: Hiremagalur
item.description:
Does this even work? I’m not convinced that writing in these notes actually makes sense for people to construct their personal wiki with.

To understand the name Hiremagalur: (hire) comes from “Hiriya” or big. (magal) or daughter. (ur) comes from ooru or town. (hiremagalur) or town [of the] eldest daughter
